name: LowPolySticks
description:
Members: Sergio Checa, José Ignacio García-Zarandieta, Rafael Pérez, Diego García y David Viera.

Have you ever asked yourself What it would be like to be a scarecrow?

Well I have the game for you, LowPolySticks the ultimate scarecrow experience, you will play not a hero,  you will be The Hero, protecting innocent carrots and other vegetable friends alike, against one ancient threat, the crows.

Now it is your time, you must join us now because Harvest Season is coming...
